products.name: Decoflux Home Women's Satin Robe Kimono Toile Mauve - Premium Long Fiber Cotton - Pink Kimono
products.brandedName: Decoflux Home Women's Satin Robe Kimono Toile Mauve - Premium Long Fiber Cotton - Pink Kimono
products.unbrandedName: Decoflux Home Women's Satin Robe Kimono Toile Mauve - Premium Long Fiber Cotton - Pink Kimono
products.description: The Toile collection inspired by French patterns that depict a highly complex, detailed scenes from daily life from old times with colors, where each element unveils a story and offers a cozy refuge that provides comfort. The charm of collection is ideally suited for those seeking a cozy and tranquil retreat. The robe kimono is cut for a relaxed fit, ensuring it looks flattering on many body shapes. It features generous kimono proportions and is fastened with a sateen sash tie. The premium long-fiber cotton sateen with a TC300 weaving density is designed for durability. Cotton sateen is a natural material with a natural shine, soft to the touch, and very easy to care for. Model is 176cm (5'7") and wears S/M Composition: 100% long-fiber cotton sateen of European origin. Thread-count 300. Silky-smooth to the touch and durable. Care Instructions: Cotton sateen fabric is known for its luxurious softness and slight sheen, making it a popular choice for bedding and clothing. To maintain its quality, it's essential to follow proper care guidelines. Machine or hand wash cotton sateen at a temperature of 40C (104F) using a gentle detergent. Avoid using bleach. Separate light and dark colours to prevent dye transfer. When drying, use a low heat setting on the dryer and remove the items while they are still slightly damp to minimize wrinkling. If you prefer to line dry, do so in an area away from direct sunlight to prevent fading. For a crisp finish, iron on a low setting if needed. These steps help preserve the fabric's smooth texture and enhance its longevity.

products.name: Black Floral Sleeveless Midi Dress
products.brandedName: Erdem Black Floral Sleeveless Midi Dress
products.description: Based in London, ERDEM is an independent women's fashion house founded by designer Erdem Moralioglu MBE. A storyteller at heart, Erdem creates expressive, powerful, timeless, and romantic designs. Each collection champions women and emphasizes not only what they wear, but, more importantly, how they feel. The Black Floral Dress promises to make a statement. With its boat neck, drop waist, and full, gathered skirt, this sleeveless midi is reminiscent of late 50s and 60s silhouettes. Cut from cotton faille decorated with brushstroke floral print, taking the silhouette up a notch. Just add statement earrings, clutch and your favorite heels for a look that's guaranteed to garner you a compliment or two. Boat neck Sleeveless Concealed back-zip closure Drop waist Gathered skirt Midi length Lined Material: 100% Cotton (body), 100% Silk (lining) Care: Dry clean

products.name: Red Regina Seersucker Flutter Sleeve Dress
products.brandedName: Sea Red Regina Seersucker Flutter Sleeve Dress
products.unbrandedName: Red Regina Seersucker Flutter Sleeve Dress
products.description: Sea New York is a NY-based brand that combines prints, playful hues, delicate embroideries, eyelets and lace to create one-of-a-kind collections. Sea pieces are designed to be effortless, optimistic, romantic, and modern. A moment for the Red Regina Seersucker Flutter Sleeve Dress, please! Take one look at this gorgeous silhouette, and we bet you'll be dreaming of places to wear it - from cocktail parties to graduations to dinners al fresco. There are plenty of details to appreciate here, including the elegant V-neckline, flutter sleeves, ruffle detailing and front tie closures. Pair with wedges and a clutch for an elevated look with just a hint of bohemian flair, or dress it down with sandals and gold hoops for weekend adventures! V-neckline Flutter sleeves Front zip closure Self-ties on front Ruffle trim at waist Slim fit Material: 95% polyester, 5% cotton Care: Dry clean

products.name: Restored Alie Shoulder Bag In Signature Jacquard With Snakeskin Detail
products.brandedName: Coach Restored Alie Shoulder Bag In Signature Jacquard With Snakeskin Detail
products.unbrandedName: Restored Alie Shoulder Bag In Signature Jacquard With Snakeskin Detail
products.description: Signature jacquard refined calf leather and genuine snakeskin One credit card slot Inside multifunction and zip pockets Bar buckle closure fabric lining Outside open pocket Adjustable strap with 21 1/2 drop for shoulder or crossbody wear 9 (L) x 6 1/2 (H) x 3 1/4 (W) Coach (Re)Loved Style No. CAS03 A little (re)love goes a long way. This Alie Shoulder Bag is a gently worn design restored to its original condition by the talented craftspeople at our Coach Repair Workshop. Passed along from members of the Coach community like you it helps to keep bags out of landfills and reduces our impact on the environmentpart of our commitment to doing better for the planet (and all of us). A feel-good find its your chance to get one of our most-loved styles if you missed out the first time. Wear it love it pass it on. A little bag that's kind of a big deal our Alie has space to hold all of the essentials. This archive-inspired bag is crafted of our lightweight Signature jacquard and refined leather with genuine snakeskin details. Featuring multifunction pockets for maximum organization and an adjustable strap for shoulder or crossbody wear it's accented with our iconic Horse and Carriage at the bar closure.

products.description: A luxury resortwear brand, known for their timeless designs and classic silhouettes. Modern, elegant and easy to wear, KALITA designs are made to be worn time after time. The Olivera Dress, with its linen-blend fabric and classic striped pattern, exudes effortless style. The halter neckline and self-tie belt add a touch of sophistication, making this a versatile piece for any occasion. Elevate your wardrobe with this timeless dress.

products.name: Safiyaa - Sarita Cape-effect Cady Gown - Pink
products.brandedName: Safiyaa Sarita Cape-effect Cady Gown - Pink
products.description: Safiyaa assigns a single artisan to handcraft each gown, ensuring exceptional attention to detail every step of the way. This 'Sarita' style is made from baby-pink cady for a figure-skimming fit and has a dramatic cape-effect back panel that cascades to a floor-pooling train. The padded shoulders add structure, and the cutout reveals a peek of skin.
